Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: In the midst of the Federal government’s $14 billion cost of living package there has been a rising wave of scams targeting financially vulnerable Australians. West Australian detention centres were in chaos with dozens of inmates vandalizing property and cells while another inmate in the Northern Territory was found dead. Off-screen popular actor Vince Colosimo appeared in court over unpaid fines they will seek counseling to repay the $65000 billed to them. In Charters Towers a town west of Townsville in Queensland there’s plenty to explore if you don’t mind the road less travelled. The police are calling on drivers for information relating to a 14-year old girl missing in northern Tasmania. Finally a body has been found in Abbey Caves Northland NZ where a high school student previously went missing in heavy storms.
